short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transforms your browser's new tab page into a peaceful and expansive landscape

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The wide horizon symbolizes unlimited possibilities, encouraging both relaxation and inspiration. Ideal for users who appreciate nature's beauty and want to bring a bit of the countryside into their digital space.

Key features:
- Beautiful cherry blossom background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Customizable search bar and shortcuts.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
